name: debatesynergy.com
description: DebateSynergy.com web app enables high school and college debate teams to store online research and stream debate rounds.

scripts.setup: npm install forever -g && sudo setcap cap_net_bind_service=+ep `readlink -f \`which node\`` && mv node_modules/mongo-express/config.default.js node_modules/mongo-express/config.js
scripts.min: cd public && minify -o ds.min.js buttons.js filetree.js init.js round.js timer.js
